subject: Basketball
College Athletics
NCAA Basketball Tournament
lead_paragraph: Seth Curry, like his brother Stephen, was dismissed by college basketball’s elite programs. And, like his brother again, he has emerged as a dazzling scoring talent at a small school, away from the spotlight.
snippet: Seth Curry, like his brother Stephen, was dismissed by college basketball’s elite programs. And, like his brother again, he has emerged as a dazzling scoring talent at a small school, away from the spotlight.
